title: Got the urge to buy...please help :)

posts.post_title: Got the urge to buy...please help :)
posts.post_content:
Missed out on a few big cards tonight, feeling a bit down and out. Looking for portraits and mildly rare backs. PM or e-mail me if you have a good deal on something, please!
[url]njdunkin1@gmail.com[/url] 

Thank you!
